issue.title: [C++] Clean up cast implementation from null to other types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4119](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4119). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We are currently generating a bunch of empty kernels when there is no need. It would be better to define a clean `NullCastKernel` that handles ensuring that appropriate buffers have been constructed for the output all-null array
